name: Here is a story of a survivor
nameigbo: Nke a bụ akụkọ banyere onye lanarịrịnụ
nameyoruba: Eyi ni itan ti olugbala kan

name: What is Gender Based Violence?
nameigbo: Gịnị bụ ime ihe ike dabere na okike?
nameyoruba: Kini Iwa-ipa Ti o Da lori abo?

name: Forms of Gender Based Violence
nameigbo: Ụdị ime ihe ike dabere na okike
nameyoruba: Awọn fọọmu ti iwa-ipa Da lori abo

name: Solution to Gender Based Violence according to UNICEF
nameigbo: Ngwọta maka ime ihe ike dabere na okike dịka UNICEF siri kwuo
nameyoruba: Ojutu si Iwa-ipa ti o Da lori abo ni ibamu si UNICEF
namehausa: Maganin Tashin Hannun Jinsi a cewar UNICEF

name: Tackling Child Abuse and Sexual Harassment
nameigbo: Ịnagide Mmekọahụ Ụmụaka na Mmegide Mmekọahụ
namehausa: Magance Cin Zarafin Yara da Cin Duri da Ilimin Jima'i

name: The Need for the Child Protection Committee
nameyoruba: Nlo fun Igbimọ Idaabobo Awọn ọmọde

name: Tips for Youth to Prevent Gender-Based Violence and Inequality
nameigbo: Ndụmọdụ maka ndị ntorobịa iji gbochie ime ihe ike dabere na okike na enweghị ahaghị nhata
nameyoruba: Awọn imọran fun Awọn ọdọ lati Dena Iwa-ipa ti O Da lori abo ati Aidogba
namehausa: Nasiha ga Matasa don Hana cin zarafi da rashin daidaito tsakanin jinsi

name: Providing Safe Spaces for Survivors of Gender-Based Violence
nameigbo: Inye oghere nchekwa maka ndị lanarịrị ime ihe ike dabere na okike
nameyoruba: Pese Awọn aaye Ailewu fun Awọn olugbala ti Iwa-ipa Da lori abo
namehausa: Samar da Wurare Lafiyayyu ga waɗanda suka tsira daga Rigimar Tushen Jinsi

name: Doesn’t sexual violence only happen to girls?
nameigbo: Ime ihe ike ọ bụghị naanị ụmụ agbọghọ na-eme?
nameyoruba: Ṣe iwa-ipa ibalopo ko ṣẹlẹ si awọn ọmọbirin nikan?
namehausa: Shin ba za a yi lalata da 'yan mata kawai ba?

name: Is there anything that can be done?
nameyoruba: Njẹ ohunkohun ti o le ṣee ṣe?
namehausa: Shin akwai wani abu da za a iya yi?

name: 16 Days of Activism against Gender-Based Violence runs from November 25 annually
nameigbo: Ụbọchị 16 nke Mgbama megide ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị na-amalite na Nọvemba 25 kwa afọ
nameyoruba: Awọn ọjọ 16 ti ijafafa lodi si iwa-ipa ti o da lori akọ tabi abo n ṣiṣẹ lati Oṣu kọkanla ọjọ 25 ni ọdọọdun
namehausa: Kwanaki 16 na fafutukar yaƙi da cin zarafi na tushen jinsi yana gudana daga ranar 25 ga Nuwamba kowace shekara
